channel.title: Newbie Guide
channel.description: As I have not played wurm before can anyone give me a simple walkthrough for server specifics, I logged on found a pile of silab and io9, went to the mine couldn't figure out how to mine iron, hurt my leg jumping around, then decided to walk to a strange glowing beam of light far into the distance only to find I was lost and didn't know how to get back to moparland. I am aware the game is supposed to be painfully in depth and has a bit of a learning curve so resources will be useful.

item.title: Newbie Guide
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan

I am aware the game is supposed to be painfully in depth and has a bit of a learning curve so resources will be useful.[/quote]get on IRC and we can halp

item.title: Newbie Guide
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

There’s a bunch of videos for beginners found here: http://www.mootred.com

There’s also the Wurm Online Wiki: http://www.wurmpedia.com/index.php/Main_Page

Read full topic

item.title: Newbie Guide
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

As I have not played wurm before can anyone give me a simple walkthrough for server specifics, I logged on found a pile of silab and io9, went to the mine couldn’t figure out how to mine iron, hurt my leg jumping around, then decided to walk to a strange glowing beam of light far into the distance only to find I was lost and didn’t know how to get back to moparland. I am aware the game is supposed to be painfully in depth and has a bit of a learning curve so resources will be useful.
